auth.Log in to the administration panel and m: Log in to the administration panel and manage your website.
auth.failed: These credentials do not match our records.
auth.throttle: Too many login attempts. Please try again in :seconds seconds.
auth.Enter the e-mail address used to log in: Enter the e-mail address used to log in
auth.The e-mail address does not exist or is: The e-mail address does not exist or is not accessible
auth.A message with a link to reset your pass: A message with a link to reset your password has been sent to the address provided. Receive the message and follow the instructions in the email.
auth.The email address or password is incorre: The email address or password is incorrect
auth.You have been successfully logged into t: You have been successfully logged into the administration panel
auth.You have been successfully logged out of: You have been successfully logged out of the administration panel
